name: Order Barcode for WC
author: Sadekur Rahman

sections.description:
Order Barcode for WC is a plugin you can add for your ecommerce site. It can track product information through scans. It generates a different barcode for each individual order placed on your woocommerce site. These barcodes can be used on packing slips, order confirmation emails and invoices or anything that benefits from having a scannable barcode attached to it. It also provides print order details facility after woocommerce porduct order.

Note: This plugin requires PHP 7.0 or higher to be activated.

Video Tutorial

You can changes settings

  • Barcode Colors – You can change color this Barcode.
  • Print Order – You can print your order with Barcode to keep documents.

You can change

  • Number of Post.
  • jQuaery Settings.
  • Background Color.
  • Barcode Color.
  • All are dynamic.

You can make a positive review on WordPress.org!

Usage

  • Go to your Dashboard after installation and navigate to “Order Barcode for WC >> Settings” to configure this Barcode.

All Features

  • Easy installation
  • Totaly Shortcode system
  • Unlimited color variation by using jQuery color picker.
  • Responsive design
  • Flexible and easy to use
  • Lightweight JQuery
sections.installation:
1. Upload order-barcode-for-wcto the/wp-content/plugins/` directory or install from plugins page.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Can it possible to Change the barcode Color?

Yes.

Could it possible to print order details?

Yes.

Is it possible to show ‘Order Barcode for WC’ in email?

Yes.
